changes.comment:
Added the current cell/compared cell location and table instance parameters to column.text.mergeCell when invoked as a function, making them accessible within the function: vtable/src/layout/cell-range/simple-cell-range.ts
Updated the type definition of mergeCell: vtable/src/ts-types/common.ts
Updated both English and Chinese documentation: column/text-column-type.md
Added a new demo document: list/list-merge-cell-function.md
